name: project
description: This IDE environment gives you access to a linux based virtual machine. A few tips: 1. `Ctrl + J` to open/close terminal. 2. click menu button located at top left to check out more functionalities/customizations. 3. `apt` and `snap` has been preloaded, so you can use `apt` or `snap` to install packages. 4. make sure all of your code are written inside this project folder.
